detaileddescription.para: Tri-state
Input pull-down device connected
Input pull-up device connected
Pn_OUTx continuously polls the input value
Inverted tri-state
Inverted Input pull-down device connected
Inverted Input pull-up device connected
Inverted Pn_OUTx continuously polls the input value
This data type describes the Input Mode type
Push pull output
Open drain output
This data type describes the Output Mode type
Initializes all the App instances based on user configuration
Inclusion of header file
This macro reads value at portpin.
This macro sets the chosen portpin to '1'.
This macro sets the chosen portpin with the boolean value provided.

parameterdescription.para: Handle to Port Pin App Instance

detaileddescription.para: This macro sets the chosen portpin to '0'.
This macro toggles the chosen portpin.

The chosen portpin is configured as input. The following definitions for Mode are available: IO004_TRISTATE (no pull device connected) IO004_PULL_DOWN_DEVICE (pull-down device connected) IO004_PULL_UP_DEVICE (pull-up device connected) IO004_CONT_POLLING (Pn_OUTx continuously samples input value) IO004_INV_TRISTATE (Inverted no pull device connected) IO004_INV_PULL_DOWN_DEVICE (Inverted pull-down device connected) IO004_INV_IO004_PULL_UP_DEVICE(Inverted pull-up device connected) IO004_INV_CONT_POLLING (Pn_OUTx continuously samples input value)
The chosen portpin is configured as output. The following definitions for Mode are available: IO004_PUSHPULL (push-pull mode) IO004_OPENDRAIN (open drain mode)
